db:abstract.db:para: Specifies a list of directories to search for QML imports.

db:article.db:para: Specifies a list of directories to search for QML imports.
This property was introduced in Qt 6.0.

db:note.db:para: This property is in technology preview and may change in future releases.

db:article.db:para: This property is currently only used when generating a deployment settings file for Android. It typically contains just the path to Qt's qml directory, but it can be a list that contains other locations to be searched as well. For application-specific QML imports, use QT_QML_ROOT_PATH instead.
